mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM VALUE(ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_STATE) VALUES(ITEM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemStock}, #{itemContent}, #{itemState})
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_STOCK = (SELECT SUM(ITEM_OPTION_STOCK) FROM ITEM_OPTION WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo} AND ITEM_OPTION_STATE = '활성화' GROUP BY ITEM_NO) WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_CRE_DATE, ITEM_SOLD_COUNT, ITEM_STATE, ITEM_VIEW_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_CRE_DATE, ITEM_SOLD_COUNT, ITEM_STATE, ITEM_VIEW_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_CRE_DATE, ITEM_SOLD_COUNT, ITEM_STATE, ITEM_VIEW_COUNT FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${orderOption}) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
